title: Ticket #679: Add unalterable field to unified param table record
description: If it doesn't already exist: In the record for each config knob in the grand param table, we need a field that flags a knob as unalterable. The idea is if a knob is flagged unalterable, the value for that knob will be the default as specified in the table and the value cannot be changed by the config file or environment variables. In other words, the value for the knob is hard-coded into the binary, and nothing a user can do can change it (short of binary editing the executable).
creator: tannenba
